name: regex-api
description: ## Validation - phone numbers - email adresses - passwords (with options?) - booking number - time - url...? - creditcard no:     - American Express :- Starting with 34 or 37, length 15 digits.     - Visa :- Starting with 4, length 13 or 16 digits.     - MasterCard :- Starting with 51 through 55, length 16 digits.     - Discover :- Starting with 6011, length 16 digits or starting with 5, length 15 digits.     - Diners Club :- Starting with 300 through 305, 36, or 38, length 14 digits.     - JCB :- Starting with 2131 or 1800, length 15 digits or starting with 35, length 16 digits. - date?     - 1. dd/mm/yyyy or dd-mm-yyyy format.     - 2. mm/dd/yyyy or mm-dd-yyyy format.     - older than X ?
